casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Allen Richard HOLMAN, Sr. No. 200A99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Alexander Charns, Durham, Mary Sheehan Pollard, for Allen Richard Holman, Sr. Diane A. Reeves, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 8th day of December 2003 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wake County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."
